entities.name: spell
entities.description: A magical spell is described as 'ï¬‚ew around the room' and caused destruction, including exploding a wardrobe mirror.

entities.name: wardrobe
entities.description: The wardrobe is mentioned as being exploded by the magical spell.

entities.name: mirror
entities.description: The mirror on the wardrobe is also exploded by the magical spell.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is described as feeling the heat of the spell and getting injured, indicating he is present in the scene.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being pulled by Harry from bed to safety, indicating she is also present in the scene.

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as taking over Harry's body and running across the bedroom, indicating a possession or transformation of some sort.

entities.name: bald man
entities.description: A bald man is mentioned as being seen by Voldemort, but not further described in the text.

entities.name: little woman
entities.description: A little woman is also mentioned as being seen by Voldemort, but not further described in the text.

relationships.description: The spell damaged the wardrobe mirror, causing it to explode.
Harry felt the heat of the spell and got injured by it.
Voldemort saw the bald man while in Harry's body, but did not interact with him further.
Voldemort also saw the little woman while in Harry's body, but did not interact with her further.
